headline: FDA grants Perfect Day GRAS approval for second precision-fermentation whey protein variant
summary: US regulatory win clears global market access for wide portfolio of alternative dairy products.

headline: Solein receives Singapore green light for sale in restaurants and retail
summary: Gas-fermented protein reaches first Asian market; full island-wide foodservice rollout starts April 2024.

headline: Noochies cat treats launch using cultivated chicken hybrid formulation
summary: First consumer product combining regular kibble with cellular chicken enters mass pet channel in Canada.

headline: Formo raises $61 million Series B to scale precision-fermentation dairy across EU
summary: Record European food-tech round closes; Berlin facility will deliver 200,000 L of precision casein annually.

headline: Bel adopts Superbrewed’s postbiotic protein for global vegan cheese lines
summary: Major cheese maker commits to bacterial biomass replacing dairy protein in Laughing Cow & Boursin SKUs.

headline: MycoWorks opens South Carolina plant shipping Reishi mycelium leather to Hermès
summary: First commercial-scale tannery-grade mycelium leather plant licensed to supply luxury brands worldwide.

headline: von Holzhausen debuts Liquidplant oil-free vegan leather in Tesla Model S accessories
summary: Plant-based leather drop-in replaces polyurethane in interiors, adopted by EV pioneer with 2024 rollout.

headline: bucha bio seed-round secures $1.1 M for bacterial cellulose packaging pilots
summary: Pre-Series A enables 4-week trials with premium cosmetic brands looking to swap plastic for bacterial films.

headline: Mogu supplies Ikea with mycelium acoustic panels made from waste streams
summary: Italian startup brings fungus-based building panels to flat-pack giant, pilot stores in Netherlands and Spain.

headline: Mycotech closes Series B to scale mycelium bricks and leather for Asian markets
summary: Indonesian firm secures $10 M to create Indonesia’s first 1,000-ton-per-year mycelium plant serving fashion and construction.
